generated.css: *,:after,:before,body,html{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;margin:0}body{margin:0;padding:0;color:#000;font-family:Fira Sans,sans-serif}.navbar-nav{gap:20px;cursor:pointer}@media (max-width:1000px){.navbar-nav{gap:0;border-bottom:2px solid #000}}.navbar #navimg{width:50px;padding:0;margin:0;flex-shrink:1}.navbar .social{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:26px;list-style-type:none;margin:auto;padding-top:10px}.navbar .social li{margin:0 2px;font-size:1em;font-weight:200;white-space:nowrap}.hero{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:stretch;font-size:1.5em;background-image:url(809a663ad1993605a2677603849ecd84.png);background-size:cover}@media (max-width:800px){.hero{font-size:1em;flex-direction:column}}.firstbox{flex:2;align-self:flex-start;padding:180px 60px;font-size:1.2em}.firstbox ul>li{list-style:none;font-weight:400;padding:2px}.firstbox i{margin-top:10px;margin-left:800px}.firstbox i:hover{color:orange}.firstbox li:last-of-type{border-bottom:2px solid #000}@media (max-width:900px){.firstbox{margin:60px 20px;padding:10px}.firstbox i{margin:auto}}.secondbox{text-align:justify;align-self:flex-end;font-weight:500;flex:1;font-size:.7em;padding:60px 10px;margin:100px 5px}@media (max-width:900px){.secondbox{display:none}}.secondbox button{border:2px solid #000}.info{display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:200px}.info img{width:30%}@media (max-width:800px){.info{padding:120px 20px}.info__one,.info__two{text-align:center;flex-direction:column}}.info__one,.info__two{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;gap:10px;margin-bottom:100px}.project_section{background-image:linear-gradient(#fff,#9bb2db)}.project_section .project_title{padding-top:100px;font-size:2em;text-align:center}.projects{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center;align-items:center;font-size:1.3em;margin:30px 0;padding:120px;background-image:linear-gradient(#fff,#9bb2db)}@media (max-width:900px){.projects{padding:20px}}.projects .card{background-image:linear-gradient(rgba(75,107,196,.856),rgba(95,106,109,.445));margin:20px 5px;opacity:.6;padding:10px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:flex-start;text-align:center;font-size:.8em;gap:5px;width:350px;transition:box-shadow .5s ease-in-out,transform .3s ease-in-out,opacity .5s ease-in-out}.projects .card:hover{background-color:#fff;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:0 0 72px 4px #000;transform:scale(1.1);opacity:1;z-index:3}.projects .card img{opacity:.7}.projects .card .card-body{margin-top:10px}.footer{background-color:hsla(0,0%,42.7%,.274);background-image:url(da3bc68066c79f30324e16cb49ac0134.webp);background-size:contain;background-position:0 0;background-repeat:no-repeat;margin-top:100px;border-top:3px solid #000;padding:30px 100px;display:grid;text-align:center;color:#000;grid-template-columns:repeat(4 1fr);grid-template-rows:repeat(2,1fr)}@media (max-width:900px){.footer{background-size:contain;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap;padding:20px 10px}}.footer .title{font-weight:900;margin-bottom:150px;margin-left:50px;grid-column-start:3;grid-column-end:4;grid-row-start:1;justify-self:flex-end}@media (max-width:900px){.footer .title{margin:16px;grid-column-start:5;grid-row-start:0;z-index:888}}.footer .oneh2{font-size:1.2em}.footer__one{background-color:rgba(177,8,8,.432);color:#fff;display:flex;grid-column-start:1;grid-column-end:3;grid-row-start:1}.footer__one>h2{margin:30px;padding:0 30px;text-align:left}.footer__one img{background-color:#fff;opacity:1}@media (max-width:900px){.footer__one{text-align:center;margin:0}.footer__one,.footer__one img{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.footer__one img{width:20%;padding:0}}.footer__social{border-top:3px solid #000;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.808);font-size:1.2em;color:#fff;gap:0;grid-column-start:2;grid-column-end:4;grid-row-start:2;display:flex;align-items:flex-end;justify-content:space-evenly}@media (max-width:900px){.footer__social{padding:2px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:15px}}.city{text-align:left;font-size:.8em;margin:auto;padding:20px}@media img:hover{filter:invert(1);cursor:pointer}
